message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is closer to what I had in mind.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $17,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to come down to $16,000?
